module.name: Gabcast
module.changelog: *2.5.0.2* localization updates *2.5.0.1* added localization ability *2.5.0* localization fixes *2.4.0.1* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0* add dest registry, fix rnav formating *1.2.5.1* bump for rc1 *1.2.5* #2070 fix proper use of script tags *1.2.4* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.2.3* Add he_IL translation *1.2.2* Fix issue where you were unable to add a channel
